categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Nason Laric was a male Human Jedi Padawan of Niquon, who trained him on Skalokor. Laric wielded a green lightsaber.

Niquon once sent Laric to take the remains of an assassin droid discovered by Borta to Lowghen Badra on Yabosta. The Dark Jedi Von Totha waylaid Laric to get him out of her way so she or her allies would be free to assassinate Niquon, but Lowghen Badra helped Laric escape. He then rescued Niquon from a Drethi sent to Skalokor by Totha's group.
